RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the agent: United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Jorge Luis Trevino: United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge Luis Trevino

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: Conducts roving stops and may temporarily detain vehicles for investigation, governed by the standard articulated in relevant case law. Involved in the stop of the black Dodge pickup truck and white Malibu sedan.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol Agent Jorge: Agent who encountered Defendants' vehicles, white Malibu sedan and black Dodge pickup truck, within the benchmark fifty miles from the Mexico border; has nearly seven years of experience with the United States Border Patrol and over a year of experience at the Freer immigration checkpoint.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States District Court: heard motions to suppress evidence obtained from the vehicle stops and arrests of Defendants RICARDO RODRIGUEZ, JR. and IGNACIO RODRIGUEZ, JR.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Freer Immigration Checkpoint: Checkpoint where the initial stop occurred and interviews were conducted
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Farm-to-Market Road 2050: road frequently and increasingly used to circumvent the checkpoints on both U.S. Highway 59 and U.S. Highway 359, known as a smuggling route
